name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Vibrant Tapestry of Music and Culture**

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret brings together an eclectic lineup of 52 artists, celebrating a rich blend of genres and styles. From the pulsating beats of Electronic and House to the raw energy of Post-Punk and Alternative Rock, the festival offers something for every music lover. Hip-Hop and Rap also feature prominently, highlighting the festival’s commitment to embracing diverse sounds and contemporary trends. With a notable 98.1% of artists having Spotify links, attendees can easily explore the lineup before the festival kicks off.

This year’s festival boasts impressive international representation, with artists hailing from 16 different countries. The USA leads the charge with 11 acts, followed closely by the Netherlands (10) and the UK (6), while other regions like Australia, Ghana, and South Africa add unique global flavors to the mix. Diversity is also evident in the performers themselves, with 12 artists identifying as people of color and a balance of male, female, mixed-gender, and non-binary acts contributing to the festival’s inclusive ethos.

Audience anticipation is high, with an average artist rating of 7.2 among the 40 acts rated so far, 76.9% of the lineup. Most artists scored between 7 and 8, signifying a consistently strong reception. Best Kept Secret 2026 promises a dynamic and inclusive musical experience, uniting a broad spectrum of sounds and perspectives for an unforgettable celebration of artistry.
